Description: Fired clay prism; nearly complete; inscription gives a list of stones, plants etc.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.218)
MSL 10 / A reconstruction of Sumerian and Akkadian lexical lists 10 The series HAR-ra = hubullu, Tablets XVI, XVII, XIX and related texts (p. 117: A)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
